page.title: 06CHURCHES
page.content:
SALVATION ARMY The Salvation Army prospers well in Tiptree and covers a wide area. Their hall was enlarged and renovated in 1976.They run a playgroup for pre_school children and do much to help the elderly and handicapped of Tiptree and the surrounding area.
ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH In 1977 a do_it_yourself group began work on a new Roman Catholic Church in Church Road.Before that Catholics had worshipped in the British Legion Hall, then in Saint Luke's Church or gone to the nearest Roman Catholic Church in Kelvedon some 3 miles away.The church is called The Saint John Houghton Catholic Centre after one of the Catholic Martyrs.It was consecrated by the Bishop of Brentwood,The Right Reverend Thomas MacMahon.
